code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./Sidebar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=_ref=>{let{collapsed,onToggle,user}=_ref;const location=useLocation();const menuItems=[{path:'/dashboard',icon:'üìä',label:'Dashboard'},{path:'/sensors',icon:'üì°',label:'Sensor Management'},{path:'/reports',icon:'üìã',label:'Reports'},{path:'/team',icon:'üë•',label:'Team'},{path:'/farm',icon:'üè°',label:'Farm Info'},{path:'/alerts',icon:'‚ö†Ô∏è',label:'Alerts'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("aside",{className:"sidebar ".concat(collapsed?'collapsed':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/logo.png",alt:"HayGuard",className:"logo-image"}),!collapsed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logo-text",children:"HayGuard"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"sidebar-nav",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"nav-list",children:menuItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:item.path,className:"nav-link ".concat(location.pathname===item.path?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-icon",children:item.icon}),!collapsed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-label",children:item.label})]})},item.path))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar-footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-avatar",children:user.name.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}),!collapsed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-name",children:user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-role",children:user.role})]})]})})]});};export default Sidebar;
